content.raw:
I've seen this in test failures on my machine. For example, the INTEGRATION_pioneer_2dx test gives the following console output with the 2.2 branch:
~~~
$ test/integration/INTEGRATION_pioneer2dx 
[==========] Running 3 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 3 tests from PhysicsEngines/Pioneer2dx
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/Pioneer2dx.StraightLine/0
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.127
2014-01-28 17:19:31.730 INTEGRATION_pioneer2dx[2084:1503] invalid drawable
Dbg ServerFixture load in 1.8 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
Dist[4.0174]
EndPose.x[3.9749]
Dbg ServerFixture::Unload
Segmentation fault: 11
~~~
A quick examination of the backtrace shows a the segfault occurs during the plugin teardown.
